name: Cyberpunk Madness
description:
Cyberpunk Madness - is a 3D hardcore shooter with surviving elements in which there is a story of one man suffering from psychiatric disorder.

The main character is Jacob. He’s been living his terrible life for ages. Every night, when he falls asleep, he sets off a parallel universe – Cyberpunk.
The main aim of the game is your fight to different monsters, collecting guns, ammos, medicines and other things that will help to survive.
During all the way your character will meet various enemies trying to him. But don’t worry – plenty of guns will help you to fight to awful hunting creatures. Do the levels, explore locations, fight to the enemy and then you will win in the war against your mind.
